feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 08:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: NE 27 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early in the morning. Risk of snow squalls late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
